sentences.sContent: You really ought to quit smoking.
The company ought to be making changes in its marketing strategy.
sentences.sCn: 公司应该在营销策略上作出改变了。

sentences.sContent: What sort of crimes ought the police to concentrate on?
sentences.sCn: 警方应当集中打击哪一类罪案？

sentences.sContent: You were out enjoying yourself when you ought to have been studying.
sentences.sCn: 应该学习的时候你却在外面玩。

trans.tranOther: used to say that someone should do something because it is the best or most sensible thing to do
